text: Alexander Alexeev () (10 March 1938 â€“ 7 October 2020) was a Russian conductor. He was a Honored Artist of the RSFSR. He was Music Director of the Kharkov Philharmonic Orchestra. Alexeev recorded with different orchestras in Russia for the label Melodya, including the Moscow Radio Symphony Orchestra. Alexeev died in Saint Petersburg on October 7, 2020 at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Russian conductors
title: Alexander Alexeev (conductor)
